title: After Town Hall by Swarm
description: Town Hall is attended by highly engaged participants of the Cardano ecosystem. They need a moderated space for discussion and networking.

title: Fund 7+8 Campaign
description: Low awareness about Project Catalyst outside of our community and thus a lot of untapped potential for the development of Cardano

title: Small Business Case Study
description: Small Businesses can be a great source of organic growth, few see value in blockchain, nor understand how it can solve fundamental problems.

title: CARDONEX ⚡
description: There is need of a college club focused on organizing hackathons, raising awareness and guiding university student talent towards Cardano.

title: WADA Proposer Workshops
description: Many African entrepreneurs are unaware of the Project Catalyst's funding campaigns and the community's encouragement of African proposals.

title: University/College Outreach
description: We need to reach out to university and college students and graduates to raise awareness of Cardano and the opportunities that exist.

title: Entrepreneurs/Developers Community
description: Little outreach to entrepreneurs and developers outside the blockchain world, losing projects with high business value for the ecosystem.

title: SOIL - Scalable Open Innovation
description: Knowledge management is crucial in any industry. Current IP laws are often more of a burden, especially in developing countries.

title: Fostering Japanese young proposers
description: The problem is Japan has few Catalyst proposers. Because Japanese ADA holders are just normal investors, not highly motivated entrepreneurs.

title: GovWorkCenter Platform
description: small business are at a disadvantage with working for the US government.

title: A YT Channel On Decentralization
description: The masses do not understand crypto. Worse, major media outlets spread false and biased information to discourage them from understanding.

title: Competition (Top 40 under 40)
description: How do we get bright entrepreneurs to submit innovative proposals to the Catalyst program.

title: Taiwan Outreach
description: Although the number of people in Taiwan following blockchain news is growing, they usually represent investors, not proposers.

title: SMALL GROUPS BETTER UNDERSTAND
description: Youtube, Telegram and others are unpersonal. Talking about money, world changes or new horizon must be discussed face to face

title: Cardano exposure on Times Square
description: Most entrepreneurs are unfamiliar with the community while most ADA investors aren't motivated proposers due to a lack of global recognition

title: Cardano & Enterprise Dev Agencies
description: Cardano is not part of typical start up development programmes/incubators etc. Entrepreneurs not aware of possiblities of Cardano.

title: Develop Cardano visuals
description: The current visual styles of the blockchain industry are very similar, making it hard for Cardano to catch attention - unless it stands out!

title: Hackathons for Startups in Ethiopia
description: The tech start-up community is growing constantly, but only a hand full of them heard about Cardano and Cardano Project catalyst.

title: Connect East Asian Entrepreneurs
description: There are no initiatives to attract and engage East Asian entrepreneurs where they are, in their local language.

title: Catalyst Infosession at Tech Events
description: People outside the community are not getting information about Catalyst in Ethiopia

title: Catalyst Crypto Venture Capital
description: Traditional business people don't understand how crypto can fund their businesses & how our industry improves the business landscape

title: 🎬 "Working Title" Film Project 🎬
description: Beyond the cryptocurrency space, very few people know about Cardano, Proj. Catalyst and all it offers devs, entrepreneurs and the world.

title: Proposals Mentors Marketplace
description: Proposers find it difficult navigate the Catalyst process and to submit quality proposals.

title: Cardano Community Campus
description: The current Cardano Community is not equipped to invite & welcome in the non-technological Change Agents that can really drive user adoption

title: Video content about Mini-Proposals
description: There is not enough video content to encourage entrepreneurs to create proposals in Catalyst

title: Community Bond - CRM tool for SME
description: Connecting all things local. Empowering local businesses & communities to increase loyalty on a digital platform using virtual coins.

title: ADA buyers collection
description: Long time ADA stay at Low price range.

title: Vietnam Tech StartupClub on Cardano
description: The young Vietnamese startup community is always full of ideas, ready to take on challenges, but does not know how to access Catalyst Fund

title: No-Code for Citizen Developers
description: The number of people who want to create applications on Cardano far outpaces the number of individuals with the required technical expertise
